show.subtitle: Dr. Jack Rasmus will focus on today’s continuing crisis in the U.S. and global economies.
show.title: alternativevisions

header.title: US Grass Roots Anti-War Protests and the Syrian War

title: US Grass Roots Anti-War Protests and the Syrian War
content:
Dr. Jack Rasmus welcomes long time guest organizer, Jeff Mackler, to discuss current grass roots efforts to organize protests against a war with Syria.
Jack and guest discuss the potential economic ‘costs’ of military action in Syria and past US wars, current efforts of the UNAC (United National Anti-War Coalition), the recent Obama-Putin ‘Plan B’ proposals, the ‘Saudi Arabia’ connection in the Syrian conflict and US drive to war, and current efforts to restore the US sequester defense cuts of $500 billion in Congress.
” Jeff Mackler is long time anti-war activist and movement leader for the last forty years.
He is currently on the national board of the UNAC (United National Anti-War Movement), and is national secretary of the Socialist Action group.
